vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Σίλας, -α (accusative to BL, § 29, W-Schm., 74, -ᾶς, -ᾶ), ὁ (Aram. שׁאִילָא; see Dalman, Gr., 157.5),
Silas (called also Σιλουανός, which see): Act.15:22, 27 15:32, 34 15:40 16:19, 25 16:29 17:4, 10 17:14-15 18:5 †
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, first mentioned at Act.15.22; also called Silvanus at 2Co.1.19; 3x
§ Silas, "asked for" possibly "dedicated to God"
Silas, (Proper name), in Luke, Acts 15:22; see Σιλουανός
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西拉 这个陽性專有名詞在原文的意思是 "多樹木的"
一個羅馬公民, 使徒保羅佈道旅行上的同伴
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
西拉 这个阳性专有名词在原文的意思是 "多树木的"
一个罗马公民, 使徒保罗布道旅行上的同伴
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Si-la; Xi-la, sứ đồ và tiên tri
